Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicRemoteTheme
public class DynamicWidgetTheme extends DynamicAppTheme implements com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.theme.base.WidgetTheme<DynamicWidgetTheme,DynamicAppTheme>
An app widget theme to store various colors and attributes for app widget which can be modified at runtime.

  • Nested Class Summary
